# navigationBar(_:shouldPush:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the navigation bar should push an item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func navigationBar(_ navigationBar: UINavigationBar, shouldPush item: UINavigationItem) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **navigationBar**: The navigation bar that the item is being pushed onto.
- **item**: The navigation item that is being pushed.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the item should be pushed; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

Sent to the delegate before pushing an item onto the navigation bar.

## Pushing items

- **navigationBar(_:didPush:)**: Tells the delegate that an item was pushed onto the navigation bar.
